abstract: Lizzie Sadin spent eight years working on her project "Children Behind Bars," which took her from Russia to Cambodia to document issues facing juvenile prisoners.
snippet: Lizzie Sadin spent eight years working on her project "Children Behind Bars," which took her from Russia to Cambodia to document issues facing juvenile prisoners.
lead_paragraph: Lizzie Sadin started researching her project "Children Behind Bars" in 1999 - though it took her more than a year to be allowed to shoot inside a prison in Russia. By then, she had no plans to seek out prisons in other countries.

headline.main: Around the World, Young and Imprisoned
